definition: Aung San (1915-1947), Burmese general and politician, hero of Myanmar independence movement and father of Aung San Su Kyi 昂山素季[Ang2 Shan1 Su4 Ji4]
to lift/to raise/to raise one's head/high/high spirits/soaring/expensive
surname Shan
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
see 昂山素季[Ang2 Shan1 Su4 Ji4]
Aung San Suu Kyi (1945-), Myanmar opposition leader and 1991 Nobel Peace laureate/also written 昂山素姬

sentences.english: Nor is known if Webb will be able to see Aung San Suu Kyi in Rangoon.
sentences.chinese: 如果韦伯也被称为将能够看到在仰光昂山苏姬。

sentences.english: But to implement it, only Daw Aung San Suu Kyi can play the central role.
sentences.chinese: 执行彬龙协议，只有昂山苏姬可以发挥核心作用。

sentences.english: Beyond the possibility of rearrest, Suu Kyi's safety is an even more fundamental concern.
sentences.chinese: 除了坐牢，昂山素季最让人担心的还是她的生命安全。

sentences.english: Suu Kyi walked into the court unrestricted and unaccompanied by guards, the source said.
sentences.chinese: 昂山素季在无卫兵监视限制下进入法庭。

sentences.english: Some analysts have cautioned against underestimating Ms. Suu Kyi, though.
sentences.chinese: 但是，很多分析家谨慎反对低估昂山素季女士。

sentences.english: The question now is how Miss Suu Kyi will fit into the new set-up.
sentences.chinese: 昂山素季现在的问题是该怎样适应眼前新的政治环境。

sentences.english: In Aung San Suu Kyi, he could not have a more reasonable opponent.
sentences.chinese: 昂山素季是他能得到的最合情合理的对手。

sentences.english: Suu Kyi has expressed dissatisfaction through her lawyer with the formation of the new breakaway party.
sentences.chinese: 昂山素季已经通过律师表达了对新党的成立的不满。

sentences.english: Her heritage, as the daughter of Aung San, Myanmar’s independence hero, was always in her favour.
sentences.chinese: 身为缅甸独立运动英雄昂山的女儿，能够仰仗父荫。

sentences.english: The European Union called for the Burmese government to release opposition leader Aung San Suu Kyi.
sentences.chinese: 欧盟呼吁缅甸政府释放反对派领导人昂山苏奇。

sentences.english: He is urging the general to release political prisoners, including opposition leader Aung San Suu Kyi.
sentences.chinese: 潘基文敦促丹瑞释放包括昂山素季在内的反对派领袖。

sentences.english: "We could always try coffee," she says wryly.
sentences.chinese: “那就试试咖啡”，昂山素季苦笑着说。

definition: Aung San Suu Kyi (1945-), Myanmar opposition leader and 1991 Nobel Peace laureate/also written 昂山素姬
father or founder of a nation/Father of the Republic (Sun Yat-sen)
Pol Pot (1925-1998), Cambodian communist leader
Indian Congress party
Hun Sen (1952-), prime minister of Cambodia since 1985
Le Duan (1907-1986), Vietnamese communist politician
Syngman Rhee (1875-1965), US trained Korean politician and dictator, president of Republic of Korea 1948-1960
Khmer Rouge, Cambodian political party
Union of Myanmar, official name of Burma 1998-2010
see 昂山素季[Ang2 Shan1 Su4 Ji4]
Li Zongren (1891-1969), a leader of Guangxi warlord faction
Kim Il Sung (1912-1994) Great Leader of North Korea
Jawaharlal Nehru (1889-1964), Indian politician, first prime minister 1947-1964
commander-in-chief/top military commander for a country or theater of operations
Myanmar or Burma National league for democracy (NLD)
pinyin: Quan2 guo2 Min2 zhu3 lian2 meng2

definition: Benito Mussolini (1883-1945), Italian fascist dictator, "Il Duce", president 1922-1943
